definition: to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: If rent longer than 24 month, the rent & deposit is on request.
sentences.chinese: 如果租期希望超过2年，租金和押金另议。

sentences.english: It certainly varies with different locations. The rental term is for three years.
sentences.chinese: 实际租金则根据铺子的而定，租期是三年。

sentences.english: A: The monthly rental fee is twenty-eight Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金是每平方英尺港币二十八元。

sentences.english: I need only to sell 2 bowls of porridge to recover my rent.
sentences.chinese: 我只需卖两碗粥就可以支付我的小时租金了。

sentences.english: The average rate for the second floor is two hundred Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 第二层的平均租金是每平方英尺港币二百元。

sentences.english: Owners decide hourly rental rate and the companies cover the insurance.
sentences.chinese: 车主可以随时定出租金率而后由公司来购买保险。

sentences.english: And would you ask if the rent is still negotiable or not?
sentences.chinese: 还有，可不可以问问租金是否仍有商量余地呢？

sentences.english: What is the rent for a type-writer?
One should not encumber oneself with hire purchase repayments at the beginning of a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 人不应该在婚姻的开始就被买卖的租金所拖累。

sentences.english: The rent is high, otherwise the house is fine.
sentences.chinese: 租金贵是贵，房子倒是很好。

sentences.english: When the MacArthur hit, I was behind in the rent.
sentences.chinese: 当初获得麦克阿瑟奖时，我还有租金要还。

sentences.english: Their goods were distrained upon for rent.
sentences.chinese: 他们的财产被扣押以抵偿租金。

sentences.english: You may qualify for rent discount by doing part-time groundskeeping.
sentences.chinese: 做草地维护的兼职或者可以让你享受租金折扣价哦。

sentences.english: The rent is payable monthly in one lump sum, before the tenth day of each month.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金一次支付，必须于租赁期每月前十天付清。

sentences.english: At the same time, Colliers said, average rents fell 9% when compared with the first quarter of the year.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，平均租金较前一季度下降9%。

sentences.english: He is six week In arrear with his rent .
sentences.chinese: 他拖欠了六个星期的租金。

definition: rent for a room or house
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
(of a landlord) to rent out one or more parts of a property/(of a tenant) to sublet one or more parts of a property/(agriculture) sharecropping
borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
